question_text: What can AWS edge locations be used for? (Select TWO.)

options.option_text: Reducing traffic on the server by caching responses

options.option_text: AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) policies

question_text: A solution that is able to support growth in users, traffic, or data size with no drop in performance aligns with which cloud architecture principle?

options.option_text: Configuring AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) roles

question_text: One benefit of On-Demand Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) pricing is:

options.option_text: the ability to bid for a lower hourly cost.
paying a daily rate regardless of time used.
pre-paying for instances and paying a lower hourly rate.

options.option_text: Ensuring that application data is encrypted at rest

options.option_text: Patching of the guest operating system

options.option_text: Moving from variable operational expense (opex) to upfront capital expense (capex).
Moving from upfront capital expense (capex) to variable capital expense (capex).

options.option_text: It verifies that hosted workloads are automatically compliant with the controls of supported compliance frameworks.
AWS is responsible for the maintenance of common compliance framework documentation.
It assures customers that AWS is maintaining physical security and data protection.
It ensures the use of compliance frameworks that are being used by other cloud providers.

question_text: Which of the following services provides on-demand access to AWS compliance reports?

When comparing AWS Cloud with on-premises Total Cost of Ownership, which expenses must be considered? (Choose two.)
Under the shared responsibility model, which of the following tasks are the responsibility of the customer? (Choose two.)

options.option_text: Maintaining the underlying Amazon EC2 hardware.
Managing the VPC network access control lists.
Encrypting data in transit and at rest.

question_text: Which scenarios represent the concept of elasticity on AWS? (Choose two.)

options.option_text: Scaling the number of Amazon EC2 instances based on traffic.
Resizing Amazon RDS instances as business needs change.
Automatically directing traffic to less-utilized Amazon EC2 instances.
Using AWS compliance documents to accelerate the compliance process.

question_text: When is it beneficial for a company to use a Spot Instance?

options.option_text: When there is flexibility in when an application needs to run.
When an instance should not be stopped.

question_text: A company is considering moving its on-premises data center to AWS. What factors should be included in doing a Total Cost of Ownership (TCO) analysis? (Choose two.)

options.option_text: Power consumption of the data center
Labor costs to replace old servers

question_text: How does AWS charge for AWS Lambda?

options.option_text: Users bid on the maximum price they are willing to pay per hour.
Users choose a 1-, 3- or 5-year upfront payment term.
Users pay for the required permanent storage on a file system or in a database.
Users pay based on the number of requests and consumed compute resources.

options.option_text: Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) transfer acceleration

question_text: Which of the following deployment models enables customers to fully trade their capital IT expenses for operational expenses?

AWS performs infrastructure discovery scans on the customer's behalf.
Amazon EC2 automatically generates an asset report and places it in the customer's specified Amazon S3 bucket.

question_text: What feature of Amazon RDS helps to create globally redundant databases?

options.option_text: Enable multi-factor authentication for the AWS account root user.
Create separate accounts for each department.

question_text: Under the AWS shared responsibility model, customer responsibilities include which one of the following?

options.option_text: Securing the hardware, software, facilities, and networks that run all products and services.
Providing certificates, reports, and other documentation directly to AWS customers under NDA.
Configuring the operating system, network, and firewall.
Obtaining industry certifications and independent third-party attestations.

question_text: Which managed AWS service provides real-time guidance on AWS security best practices?
Which feature adds elasticity to Amazon EC2 instances to handle the changing demand for workloads?

Which AWS hybrid storage service enables on-premises applications to seamlessly use AWS Cloud storage through standard file-storage protocols?
What is a responsibility of AWS in the shared responsibility model?

options.option_text: Updating the network ACLs to block traffic to vulnerable ports.
Patching operating systems running on Amazon EC2 instances.
Updating the firmware on the underlying EC2 hosts.
Updating the security group rules to block traffic to the vulnerable ports.

question_text: Which architectural principle is used when deploying an Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS) instance in Multiple Availability Zone mode?

options.option_text: Automate everything that can be automated.

question_text: What does it mean to grant least privilege to AWS IAM users?

options.option_text: It is granting permissions to a single user only.
It is granting permissions using AWS IAM policies only.
It is granting AdministratorAccess policy permissions to trustworthy users.
It is granting only the permissions required to perform a given task.

question_text: What is a benefit of loose coupling as a principle of cloud architecture design?

options.option_text: It allows applications to have dependent workflows.
It prevents cascading failures between different components.
It allows companies to focus on their physical data center operations.

question_text: A director has been tasked with investigating hybrid cloud architecture. The company currently accesses AWS over the public internet.Which service will facilitate private hybrid connectivity?

options.option_text: Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (Amazon VPC) NAT Gateway
Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) Transfer Acceleration

question_text: A company's web application currently has tight dependencies on underlying components, so when one component fails the entire web application fails. Applying which AWS Cloud design principle will address the current design issue?

options.option_text: Implementing elasticity, enabling the application to scale up or scale down as demand changes.
Enabling several EC2 instances to run in parallel to achieve better performance.
Focusing on decoupling components by isolating them and ensuring individual components can function when other components fail.
Doubling EC2 computing resources to increase system fault tolerance.

question_text: How can a customer increase security to AWS account logons? (Choose two.)

options.option_text: Use Amazon Cognito to manage access

question_text: Which is the MINIMUM AWS Support plan that provides designated Technical Account Managers?

options.option_text: Deployment to a single Availability Zone

question_text: Which type of AWS storage is ephemeral and is deleted when an instance is stopped or terminated?

options.option_text: Users do not have to guess about future capacity needs.

options.option_text: Store data and backups in the same region.

question_text: Why should a company choose AWS instead of a traditional data center?

options.option_text: AWS provides users with full control over the underlying resources.
AWS does not require long-term contracts and provides a pay-as-you-go model.
AWS offers edge locations in every country, supporting global reach.

question_text: Which solution provides the FASTEST application response times to frequently accessed data to users in multiple AWS Regions?

options.option_text: AWS CloudTrail across multiple Availability Zones

options.option_text: Access to a Technical Project Manager

question_text: How can a user protect against AWS service disruptions if a natural disaster affects an entire geographic area?

options.option_text: Deploy applications across multiple Availability Zones within an AWS Region.
Use a hybrid cloud computing deployment model within the geographic area.
Deploy applications across multiple AWS Regions.
Store application artifacts using AWS Artifact and replicate them across multiple AWS Regions.

question_text: How does AWS MOST effectively reduce computing costs for a growing start-up company?

options.option_text: It provides on-demand resources for peak usage.
It automates the provisioning of individual developer environments.
It implements a fixed monthly computing budget.
